headline: Climb Announces United States Partnership with Fortinet
summary: EATONTOWN, N.J., Dec. 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Climb, an international specialty technology distributor and wholly owned subsidiary of Climb Global Solutions, Inc. (NASDAQ: CLMB) announced the launch of their partnership with Fortinet, the global cybersecurity leader driving the convergence of networking and security.
